riskDisclaimer.title: Important Risk Disclaimer
riskDisclaimer.tradingRiskText: Trading Forex, cryptocurrencies, commodities, and stocks involves substantial risk of loss. You could lose all invested capital. Only trade with money you can afford to lose. The majority of retail traders lose money.
riskDisclaimer.notFinancialAdviceText: Signals are for educational purposes only and NOT financial advice. We are NOT licensed advisors or brokers. Make your own independent decisions and consult qualified professionals before investing.
riskDisclaimer.pastPerformanceText: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Historical win rates do not predict future trading success. Individual results vary significantly.
riskDisclaimer.capitalAtRiskText: Only trade with money you can afford to lose. Never use borrowed funds. You are solely responsible for all trading decisions. TradeSignal PK is NOT liable for any losses.
riskDisclaimer.secpComplianceText: TradeSignal PK is an educational signals platform. We are NOT a licensed broker or advisor. We do NOT hold funds or execute trades. Use SECP-licensed brokers only. Verify at www.secp.gov.pk
